trans-unit.source: Represents an instance of a type that can be passed across process and application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 表示可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞之型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> structure to pass arguments of types that are not determined until run time across process and application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>傳遞引數不等到執行階段決定跨處理序之型別的結構和應用程式定義域界限。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> is similar to that of the `VARIANT` type in COM.
trans-unit.target: 目的<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>是類似的`VARIANT`在 COM 中的型別

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> to pass the following types and values as remote arguments:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>傳遞下列類型和值做為遠端的引數：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Type.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract>。

trans-unit.source: Intrinsic data types.
trans-unit.target: 內建資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Arrays that contain elements of intrinsic data types.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，其中包含內建資料類型的項目。

trans-unit.source: An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: 內建資料類型是基本資料類型 (也就是<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性型`true`) 或<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Decimal>， <xref:System.DateTime>，或<xref:System.DBNull>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> provides constructors for each of the types that it supports.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> 提供的每個支援類型建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.CreateRemoteArgument%2A> methods to create <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> objects.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.CreateRemoteArgument%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.CreateRemoteArgument%2A> methods automatically call the appropriate <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.%23ctor%2A> constructor for your argument type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.CreateRemoteArgument%2A>方法會自動呼叫適當<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.%23ctor%2A>建構函式的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: If you create a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> using the default parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.TypeCode.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您建立<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>預設無參數建構函式，<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>屬性設定為值<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>屬性設定為值<xref:System.TypeCode.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> argument that can be passed across process or application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class that represents an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract>, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property to <xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>屬性<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract>、<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>屬性<xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>，而<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> argument that can be passed across process or application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class that represents an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體表示 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray>, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property to the type code of the array element type, and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>屬性<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray>、<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>至陣列項目類型的類型程式碼的屬性和<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: The array element type is not a base type (that is, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeCode(System.Type)" /> method for the array element type returns <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />).
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列元素型別不是基底型別 (亦即，這個陣列元素型別的 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeCode(System.Type)" /> 方法會傳回 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> argument that can be passed across process or application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <c>value</c> is an argument that is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>value</c> 是以傳址方式傳遞的引數則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class that represents an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> argument that can be passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體表示可透過傳址方式傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract>, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property to <xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A> property to the value of the `isByRef` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>屬性<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract>、<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>屬性<xref:System.TypeCode.Object?displayProperty=nameWithType>，而<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A>屬性設為值的`isByRef`參數。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> values that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents an intrinsic type, an array of intrinsic types, an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" />, or the <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 代表內建型別、內建型別的陣列、<see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 還是 <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> that specifies the base type of the remote argument.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" />，指定遠端引數的基底型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> and <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> for an argument that is not passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 針對不是以傳址方式傳遞的引數，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor assigns the default value of the data type specified by the `typeCode` parameter to the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會指派所指定之資料類型的預設值`typeCode`參數<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>。

trans-unit.source: An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: 內建資料類型是基本資料類型 (也就是<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性型`true`) 或<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Decimal>， <xref:System.DateTime>，或<xref:System.DBNull>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Intrinsic" /> or <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray" />, and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" /> or <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Intrinsic" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray" />，以及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing" /> 及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract" />，以及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Array" /> argument that can be passed across process or application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 可跨處理序或應用程式定義域界限傳遞的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 引數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <c>array</c> is an argument that is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>array</c> 是以傳址方式傳遞的引數則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class that represents an <see cref="T:System.Array" /> argument that can be passed by reference.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray>, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property to the type code of the array element type, and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A> property to the value of the `isByRef` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>屬性<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray>、<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>至陣列項目類型的類型程式碼的屬性和<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.IsByRef%2A>屬性設為值的`isByRef`參數。

trans-unit.source: The array element type is not a base type (that is, the <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeCode(System.Type)" /> method returns <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" /> for the array element type).
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列元素型別不是基底型別 (亦即，這個陣列元素型別的 <see cref="M:System.Type.GetTypeCode(System.Type)" /> 方法會傳回 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> values that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents an intrinsic type, an array of intrinsic types, an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" />, or the <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 代表內建型別、內建型別的陣列、<see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 還是 <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> that specifies the base type of the remote argument.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" />，指定遠端引數的基底型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the remote argument is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果是以傳址方式傳遞遠端引數則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> and <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> for an argument that can be passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 針對可透過傳址方式傳遞的引數，使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.TypeCode" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor assigns the default value of the data type specified by the `typeCode` parameter to the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會指派所指定之資料類型的預設值`typeCode`參數<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>。

trans-unit.source: An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: 內建資料類型是基本資料類型 (也就是<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性型`true`) 或<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Decimal>， <xref:System.DateTime>，或<xref:System.DBNull>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Intrinsic" /> or <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray" />, and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" /> or <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Intrinsic" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.IntrinsicArray" />，以及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Missing" /> 及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract" /> and <paramref name="typeCode" /> is not <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 是 <see cref="F:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind.Contract" />，以及 <paramref name="typeCode" /> 不是 <see cref="F:System.TypeCode.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="remoteArgKind" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 所表示的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents; <see langword="null" /> if the value of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> has not yet been specified.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this method to create a <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> that represents a `null` array that contains elements of intrinsic data types.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用此方法來建立<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>表示`null`陣列，其中包含內建資料類型的項目。

trans-unit.source: An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents an argument that is passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 是否代表以傳址方式傳遞的引數。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents an argument that is passed by reference; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 代表以傳址方式傳遞的引數則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> that indicates the kind of argument that the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 所代表的引數類型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> values that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> represents an intrinsic type, an array of intrinsic types, an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" />, or the <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一個 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind" /> 值，表示 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> 代表內建型別、內建型別的陣列、<see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.IContract" /> 還是 <see cref="F:System.Type.Missing" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: An intrinsic data type is a primitive data type (that is, the <xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the type is `true`) or a <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.DateTime>, or <xref:System.DBNull>.
trans-unit.target: 內建資料類型是基本資料類型 (也就是<xref:System.Type.IsPrimitive%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性型`true`) 或<xref:System.String>， <xref:System.Decimal>， <xref:System.DateTime>，或<xref:System.DBNull>。
